longBusinessSummary: Citychamp Watch & Jewellery Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, sells, and distributes watches and timepieces in Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, Liechtenstein, and internationally. The company operates through Watches and Timepieces, Property Investments, and Banking and Financial Businesses segments. It offers watches and timepieces under the Rossini, EBOHR, Corum, Eterna, Dreyfuss & Co, J&T Windmills, Kana, Ernest Borel, and Rotary brands. The company is also involved in the property investment activities; distribution of glasses; and issuance of bonds. In addition, it operates a bank in Liechtenstein that offers financial services, including accepting client deposits and granting loans; and investment advice, asset management, and transaction banking services for entrepreneurial families and individuals. Further, the company provides investment-counselling services; acts as technical administrator of fund units; dealing and advising in securities; and watch maintenance and repairment, and technical advisory services. It operates through a network of approximately 2,000 point of sales/sales outlets; and 280 self-owned retail shops and distribution outlets in Mainland China. The company was formerly known as China Haidian Holdings Limited and changed its name to Citychamp Watch & Jewellery Group Limited in May 2014. Citychamp Watch & Jewellery Group Limited is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.
